textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 41in / 104cm MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Dry clean. Lining: 92% polyester/6% spandex. Shell: 100% polyester. Fabric: Sequined mesh. Matte sequins shimmer throughout a full-length Line & Dot skirt. Fish-tail hem and covered elastic waist. Partially lined. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer The Line & Dot clothing philosophy is one of simplicity and femininity. A collection of graceful pieces made with thoughtful attention to detail, these easy-to-style dresses, skirts, tops, and jackets project a modern aesthetic in figure-flattering lines and soft, luxe fabrics. Line & Dot is headquartered in California and cultivates an inventive, evolving look, incorporating European design elements and subtle on-trend statements for the fashion savvy.
